participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and sociable, loves to try new foods and explore local cultures.
participant_1.background: I love to eat at the local diner because it is close to my house and the food is always good. I especially enjoy listening to the band The Mutineers. I am a graphic designer. I'm allergic to apples yet still eat them. I have two roommates.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and laid-back, enjoys music and finding beauty in everyday experiences.
participant_2.background: I visited a small mountain town with my family and enjoyed the beautiful scenery and fresh air. My sister and I are in a grunge band. I've started bringing a snack to work so I'm not starving by the time my students arrive. My favorite people are those who share my love of game shows and fashion. My first guitar was my favorite thing I ever bought.

content.text: I am really excited for dinner tonight. I love eating at the local diner.
I'm not usually a fan of diners, but I recently visited a small mountain town with my family. The diner there was delicious!
Oh yeah? What did you like about it?
The atmosphere was so cozy and the food was amazing. The town itself was beautiful, too. I love being in the mountains.
That sounds really nice! I'm going to have to check out that diner sometime.
You should! And if you're ever in the mountains, I'd be happy to recommend some good places to eat.
Thanks! I'm always looking for new places to explore.
Me too! I love trying new things.
What's your favorite thing to do when you're exploring a new place?
I love trying the local food. I also like to go for hikes and check out the local sights.
Sounds like we have a lot in common! I love hiking and trying new foods too.
That's great! We should go on an adventure together sometime.
